ygData.subject: Re: Marnek Dagger
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not trained in dagger, and so far never get any weap from the other guys.  I bought my own RTS at 20pp.  I think u can get woven at guk, but I m not sure
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not trained in dagger, and so far never get any weap from the other
guys. I bought my own RTS at 20pp. I think u can get woven at guk, but
I'm not sure if it's worth doing so. The place is damn dangerous even for
lvl 20, and woven armor is only 1 ac more than cloth + magical armor. I
dunno why it cost so much for that extra ac and dunno what can tat 'magic'
do.

If anyone selling or know anyone selling FBR, pls let me know, looking for
it badly.

Zil

On Thursday, 08 July, 1999 10:54 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
[SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> errr... when u say loan to me... isit me (Nicademous)... or Ziltus? or is
he using that staff? heheee... also... any idea where to get woven stuff? i
mena fer low level kids like me...
>
> tonite cant make it... not enough sleep liaoz... BUT i will be online
late FRIDAY NITE! u ok with that? :))))))
>
> Nic
> A Dark Elf Necromancer thast for the first time dont see life sux....

> The last i checked , i was mistaken on the items need for the current
quest. The marnek Dagger will only be needed for the next higer quest which
includes the Skull of Jhen'Tra from the gnoll embalmers and The Zaharns
Coronet from the High Priest Himself at permafrost, Zaharns would have
about 3 other lvl 31 with him. Sooo i dont think im doin that quest anytime
soon. like 15 lvl more to go ? :P
>
> I'll loan the Dagger of Marnek to U till i hit lvl 35 Currently 20th
only) or when i get another one , u can keep it. Look me up tonite and i'll
pass it on to u :)
>
> YY'ing at HH Keep

> From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>

> Subject: [sg-everquest] Crazy + Brewing...

> hiya guys,
> thanks again to u guys fer helping me out last nite for the small
donation... (i.e., Ziltus n Sereph)... i guess i took slightly more than
the 5-7pp range... more like 10pp... but i was starting to make money by
the 9th or 10th pp... so now i have a reasonable amount :) after brewing it
fer awhile... but can be pretty boring brewing.... ok... just a few quick
questions... how many of each stuff do u guys buy usuaully when u go on
brewing fer 1 round? i have like 40 of each materials (ie.., hops, malt,
etc)... and filled up all my backups (yes! i bought 5 backups)... n start
brewing... any better method? or faster method? also.. i said b4 i m gonna
return the money... although sereph u said i can keep em... if u still want
em... do let me know... i will return em to ya...
>
> now... im thinking of picking up another trade skill... maybe
tailoring... since i can make woven fer myself... can i? or cant? any
advice on that? or perhaps i will work abit on my levels b4 i start going
into something... as fer that dagger yiyang is selling... someone was
selling his fer 40pp only...
>
> once again... thanks guys fer the help...
> Nicademous
